name: Rally Fury MUD: Real Driving G
name_original: Rally Fury MUD: Real Driving G
description:
Rally Fury MUD: Real Driving Game is the newly designed offroad racing, driving and drifting game where user would drive multiple rally cars on specialized offroad track and chase targets.
Have yourself the most amazing offroad driving experience, take the car uphill to narrow tracks through curvy roads.

Features:
Quality touch screen
Realistic Graphics
Magnificent Drift Physics
Different Rally Vehicle
Different Race Tracks
Easy and understandable interface
